title: Argue who is/are the most admirable and/or despicable character(s) in the novel and why
Discuss how The Great Gatsby is the quintessential American novel. What does it have to offer about the American identity and the American Dream?
posts: Hard work, ambition and determination - still valid, if you ask me!
It was once true, but no longer stands
Guys, don't be so negative!  I think there's still a lot to say of what the American dream continues to mean for many!
